review: Baffled how restaurants can run out of stuff...but especially this Applebee's. I come here fairly often...and it seems like every time I come here they are out of something. Finally had to write a review...this time they were out of ranch dressing.... RANCH DRESSING!! I wanted wings for Monday night football... But decided against it because they were OUT OF RANCH DRESSING. How does that happen??
The food is fair to ok.  Mistakes in the cooking part are often made.  Don't be in any hurry once you arrive, it might take some time to get your meal.
